title: Kai'Sa isn't even on PBE yet and all of the QQ here is unreal
body: What is wrong with you people

replies.body:
have u seen her kit? she has spells in it
op
You forgot to mention that she can auto attack you.  Literally no other champ can do that.
she can teleport from mile away to you lol is this akali 2.0 ?
She needs a plasma stack to dash though, not like Akali I believe
her long range W do that
Have fun landing that from a mile away though, especially if you don't see where they are or if they're standing in a minion wave.

Have you seen the speed of the Missile?  If she DOES have vision on you and she is out of vision then its going to be very hard to dodge.  ONLY mobile champs have any real chance to dodge it.  More Riot hates Immobile mages.
I could agree if her W had the speed of Jhin's W, but I believe it even slower than Morgana's Q, so if you have vision on her casting it, you should really have no trouble dodging that!

You can see the projectile on the [official reveal](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/champion-reveal-kaisa).

I can't eyeball the projectile speed on that to a precise unit count, but. I feel confident in saying it's *faster* than Morg Q (1400 units/second).

(Actually, I can do some maths. She starts casting right at the start of second three, and it hits right before second 5. Given cast time is 0.25 by standard design, means it took about 1.5-1.7 seconds to reach the destination.

It looks longer than Jhin's W, but. I'm presuming it's same length for now (3000 units). 3000 / 1.666... = 1800 units/second. That fits with my gut feeling on the spell.)

You could say that about Zoe's E, except zoe's E is quite fast. And stuns you. Which can set up for an instant kill, or a ton of damage. And utilizing her ult, She doesn't even need to risk anything if she wants to kill you.

Meanwhile Kai'sa's W moves at about the speed of an Ashe E, and when she hits it she gets to teleport to you. And puts herself at a lot more risk then a Zoe would.
that's why only good kai sa players will choose the weakest targets to snipe

That plasma stack is very easy to get, especially if you have another person on your team. :)

(AKA Anyone with a CC ability)

> [{quoted}](name=xGunna1,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LAb6UEKg,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-20T19:09:20.290+0000)
>
> she can teleport from mile away to you lol is this akali 2.0 ?

gotta say her teleport range is my only issue with her kit. she can teleport to you from waaayyyy too far away, she could enter dragon pit from red buff over two walls for god sake
It's not as far as you'd think.  And Azir can get from red buff to dragon pit too.  A lot of champs can do it.

> [{quoted}](name=SuperRiceBoi,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LAb6UEKg,comment-id=00000000000000010000,timestamp=2018-02-22T22:49:38.326+0000)
>
> It's not as far as you'd think.  And Azir can get from red buff to dragon pit too.  A lot of champs can do it.

My issue is that it's an ADC with the mobility. Thankfully it's only an engage not a disengage
exept for her E, she might be the only champ that actually can't AA at times....
{{champion:202}} and {{champion:104}} have to reload...

> [{quoted}](name=Akali is SO HOT,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LAb6UEKg,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-02-20T19:00:03.490+0000)
>
> You forgot to mention that she can auto attack you.  Literally no other champ can do that.

that's broken

There is nothing wrong with people expressing their opinion. 
If people think the champ looks overloaded on paper, then be it.



I would also like to point out that this is a QQ thread calling out QQ threads.
No but theres something wrong with people Completely judging a champ before they've even play vs/ as or watched someone play against it.

That, or there's actually people here on this board who aren't complete mongoloids, possibly even with an understanding of the game, and can see the implications her kit will have and the issues it will cause, regardless of numbers.

Says the incoherent trash in front of me. You don't even have the champs numbers yet to still call it op is like anyone saying that book cover definitely looks bad I should just hate it because of that.

> [{quoted}](name=Delibird,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LAb6UEKg,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-02-20T19:01:01.148+0000)
>
> There is nothing wrong with people expressing their opinion. 
> If people think the champ looks overloaded on paper, then be it.
> 
> 
> 
> I would also like to point out that this is a QQ thread calling out QQ threads.

I wish I could upvote your comment, and then upvote you again for your name.

Akali isn`t even reworked yet and I already see you posting about how they ruined her and her deep lore and personality for you so you tribute her by posting all the hentai folders of Akali you have on r/akalimains
What the hell are you talking about?
The future
TBH I think you're right.
She literally has a kit that does damage, she's broken af

I believe her main limiting factor will be her attack range. She may have mobility but that is bc she has such low range. Plus, any champ that gets fed can look broken. Thats the point of the spotlight, make you get excited for a champion

Exactly. Any champ that gets fed looks broken. Just because I get crushed by, say, a kassadin doesn't automatically make Kassadin broken. The person just played the champ well and built good items. The teasers are showing those sorts of best case scenarios. What, do people think they'd get hyped for a new champ by watching said champ fail miserably? They want you to think the champ looks powerful, of course they'll show it with an optimal build.

Did anyone notice it looks like her E gives her ghost while she's invisible?

Also, my guess on build path:

AD: {{item:3153}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3087}}    And if you're feeling crazy and her CC can add stacks,  {{item:3022}}  woah.

AP: {{item:3115}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3006}} sell boots for  {{item:3285}} 

I'd love to see frozen mallet be a good item on an ADC lol
If it does work on her own slows, I would think frozen mallet might be core, as being in a fight might mean getting a proc of every other auto, as well as some added health considering she wants to dive opponents, which will allow her to take an extra AD auto late game.
The invisibility is a bonus effect she gets if she builds enough attack speed. The speed boost itself is the base ability, and she can't attack during the boost.
Yeah that's a given in print, the bonus speed during her e charge isn't though.

Looking at the video of the ability, it doesn't look like she gains bonus speed when going invisible, she seems to move at about the same speed, or maybe a little faster but they may be showing her with more move speed. Remember, berserker's greaves boosts move speed and attack speed. They may have just shown her with that as one of the items bought to give the e boost, but again I don't think i saw her going faster than before.

The complaining has only begun. Imagine what people will think when they see videos of their favorite diamond to challenger tier YouTubers fucking poor bronze and silvers on PBE. It's not like matchmaking on PBE is trash, the fact those high rank people means the champ has to be OP!

In part because we can see who cancer she will be.  Now Maybe her W will be on a long CD like Swains but its speed makes it hard to dodge when it comes from the fog and then she can Ult to you.   So She has a dash and a mid range TP to stay on someone... Then Zoes Passive but on an Activate (and since its Q I assume a short CD) and them she does % missing HP every 4 stacks (and with {{item:3124}}  she gets them twice as fast).

So ya its called a overloaded kit.

i was thinking the guinsoos was op on her too. especially since she has ap scaling. 
But i think her attack range will make it tough to keep that up. She has to be in close to attack and that is when people can get her. she will have to avoid teamfights in a way.
Vayne does max hp and people dont build guinsoos that often on her.

She's looking to be a hybrid on hit champ.  If her passive buffs aren't adaptive, you won't want to go {{item:3078}}  or {{item:3100}} , you're gonna want to go with {{item:3085}} to unleash her passive on all her foes .  After that you can sell boots for {{item:3022}}  if her own cc applies procs, or another life steal item.  Frankly, I think I will go with Frozen mallet if the above is true.
True with her Q being on a ~6s CD and being her shortest CD spell Tri or Lich are not options

I really want to know if her own cc makes bonus stacks.   Knowing that she is more prone to diving it looks like more health would do her well, so {{item:3022}} would be a good fit for both.  Dang, I just want to build this on an ADC and it actually be less than super situational.

>_Nearby allies'_ _**Immobilizing effects**_

Hey buying Frozen Mallet won't apply her passive more than her AA's already do.
I'm gonna test it out on her anyway, it suggests it's based on crowd control but she doesn't have cc in her kit.   If it doesn't work, oh well.  If it does, she will shred in spite of the reduced AD.

You forgot to mention that she's "generic LoL beautiful" and how problematic that is.

Lawls.
didnt see a single complaint yet only people who complain about the complaints lol

Ok let me tell you something, we don't trust anything that riot does now and it becomes predictable for the game health condition. I am currently SUPER SCARED of the new champion, especially after soo many mistakes that riot is currently doing.

League's history is filled with OP champs at release.  Irelia had an insane win rate when she got released and was nerfed 8 patches in a row.  Xin Zhao was nicknamed Win Now when he was released cuz he was broken too.  We know from the recent past that Ornn and Zoe were broken OP.  After her mini rework, LeBlanc was disgusting.  Also, remember that one day when Galio could do 150% of your max health in 1.5 seconds?  This isn't anything new.
Orn wasn't Op on release though, like many others he was overbuffed soon after release because people still figured out how to properly use him while he also was on the weak side at the start.
my new name will be kai'sa is SO HOT .
Go for it my dude
